metadata.title: Pervaiz Malik meets Azerbaijanâ€™s Prime Minister

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 03 (APP): Minister for Petroleum Ali Pervaiz Malik on Tuesday met Ali Asadov, Azerbaijan's Prime Minister. The meeting hailed the dynamic development of friendly and fraternal relations between Azerbaijan and Pakistan across all fields, said a news release. The parties highlighted the importance of the events held as part of the Baku Energy Week in promoting international energy cooperation. During the meeting, the sides explored the opportunities for cooperation in the energy sector, and reviewed promising oil and gas projects between the two countries.
